sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
    Modal,
    ModalOverlay,
    ModalContent,
    ModalHeader,
    ModalFooter,
    ModalBody,
    Textarea,
    ModalCloseButton,
    FormLabel,
    Input,
    FormControl,
    useDisclosure,
    Button,
  } from "@chakra-ui/react";

/**
 * General modal popups for the different data conversions
 * @param {Object} props contains strings with instructions on what to show
 * @returns {React Component} one all purpose modal that can be modified for different props
 */

  export default function InitialFocus() {
    const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
  
    return (
      <>
        <Button
              colorScheme="pink"
              variant="outline"
              onClick= {onOpen}
            >
              Оставить отзыв
            </Button>
        <Modal
          isOpen={isOpen}
          onClose={onClose}
        >
          <ModalOverlay />
          <ModalContent>
            <ModalHeader>Что вы думаете о GeekBrains?</ModalHeader>
            <ModalCloseButton />
            <ModalBody pb={6}>
              <FormControl>
                <Input placeholder='Ваше имя' />
              </FormControl>
  
              <FormControl mt={4}>
                <FormLabel></FormLabel>
                <Textarea placeholder='Ваш отзыв' />
              </FormControl>
            </ModalBody>
  
            <ModalFooter>
              <Button colorScheme='blue' mr={3}>
                Готово
              </Button>
              <Button onClick={onClose}>Отмена</Button>
            </ModalFooter>
          </ModalContent>
        </Modal>
      </>
    )
  }
